name: PROTEST
description: Long adventure of two girls in love! Cute anime girls struggle with discrimination. Only you can help save their pure love! Exciting RPG with nice anime graphics!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 228 Ghz or faster Memory: 1337 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
